description:
Why get just anyone to officiate your wedding when you've got a line on Benedict Cumberbatch? The English actor oversaw a same-sex wedding in Ibiza Saturday (July 20), two days after he was nominated for an Emmy for BBC's "Parade's End."如果你认识本尼迪克特·康伯巴奇，干嘛还要请其他随便什么人来主持你的婚礼？这位凭借BBC剧集《队列之末》获得本届艾美奖提名的英国演员上周六（7月20日）在伊比沙岛见证了一场同志婚礼。

Cumberbatch says he agreed to officiate the wedding, something he's never done before, because it was an old friend who asked, telling the Sun, "It's a very private, lovely thing to be asked to do."康伯巴奇说这是一个老朋友的请求，所以他同意主持这场婚礼，这是他以前从没有做过的事。他告诉《太阳报》：“这是场私人婚礼，被请来做主持也是件开心的事情。”

As lovely as it is, Benedict couldn't let it go without injecting a bit of humor. "Of course I'm going to make a joke after it if it goes well," he says, "I do weddings. Next will be children's parties and bat mitzvahs." At least if that whole being an actor thing doesn't work out, Cumberbatch has a good career to fall back on.更可爱的是，本尼迪克特还是不改幽默本色，“当然如果一切顺利的话我会开个玩笑，”他说，“现在我做了婚礼的主持，接下来我还要做孩子们聚会和犹太男孩成人礼的主持咧。”看来如果当演员不成功的话，康伯巴奇至少还有个后备事业可以依靠。

Photos of the joyous affair have appeared on Facebook, as well as one with a shirtless Benedict and his model girlfriend, Katia Elizarova, relaxing in Ibiza.Facebook上传出了这场喜庆婚礼的照片，另外还有张光着身子的卷福同他的模特女友Katia Elizarova一起在伊比沙岛度假的照片。
